fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Control a player into another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn your player's role, even if they're control immune.
- Roleblock immune.
- With the Necronomicon, become detection immune, and gain Basic attack and defense. Attack players who you control.
- You will always get the Necronomicon on Night 3.
